name: Any Candy
description:
Any Candy is a simple match 3 game, tap screen drag and drop the candy get high score. Made in Construct 2. Enjoy the game!

The game has nice graphics and music.
Collect as many Jelly as you can and get the most points.
Forward!

The game is waiting for you:
- many jelles
- Pleasant music
- set of points

Any Candy is Nice time killer.a
